title: EZE IGWE CHUKWU M'EGHERE ANYI UZO NK'IGWE

content: Eze Igwe Chukwu meghere anyị ụzọ nk’igwe
Eze Igwe Chukwu meghere anyị ụzọ nk’igwe
Eze Igwe, Chukwu Igwe, meghee ụzọ,
Eze kere ala, kee Igwe, meghee ụzọ,
Nke nyere anyị, meghee anyị ụzọ nk’igwe.
Ala ọma nke nyere anyị, meghee anyị ụzọ nk’igwe.
